author: IGN
description: Step into the dangerous, fantasy world of Sword Hero in this trailer for the upcoming RPG. In Sword Hero, you will start from nothing, washed up on the shores of the island of Wes, an open world brimming with opportunities and danger. Forge your own path as you establish yourself through faction quests, reputation, and even body modifications. Sword Hero will be available on PC, and a combat arena demo is out now on Steam.
title: Sword Hero - Official Combat Arena Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Build your dream squad in EA SPORTS™ NHL® 26 Hockey Ultimate Team™. That starts with HUT Seasons, where new lineups raise the stakes every time you hit the ice. With rotating team captain boosts, unique player combinations, and the introduction of a Salary Cap system, team building has more strategy and variety than ever before.

Take your skills to the next level in Ranked, climbing the divisions and qualifying for HUT Champs at the top of the leaderboard. A restructured system ensures that every game pushes you closer to new rewards.

Prefer to go offline? HUT Cup Chase lets you run a full season against the CPU, with an 18-game schedule and playoffs that lead to the championship trophy and seasonal rewards. It’s steady progression without the pressure of leaderboards.

Expand your roster with Heroes and Icons, new card types celebrating unforgettable performances and legendary players across hockey history. Multiple drops throughout the year will keep squads fresh and give you even
title: NHL 26 - Official "Hockey Ultimate Team" Deep Dive

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Rogue Labyrinth, a roguelite action-narrative adventure. Battle through the ranks of a procedurally generated labyrinth where rivals, monsters, and an eager audience decide your fate. Turn anything into a projectile, unleash chaotic bullet-hell combat, and harness hundreds of powers and artifacts to survive the show. Rogue Labyrinth is available now on Steam. 

#IGN
title: Rogue Labyrinth - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: 2.5D pixel art is one of our favorite visual styles right now, and so we're pretty excited about Aegis Force: The Scorian War, an upcoming turn-based tactical fantasy RPG inspired by Final Fantasy Tactics and Shining Force 2 that's got the "retro-modern" 2.5D pixel-art look. Play the 90-minute demo starting on September 2 on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3154550/Aegis_Force_The_Scorian_War/
title: Aegis Force: The Scorian War – Official Demo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dive into Hell is Us, a third-person action-adventure game that blends tense melee combat with the thrill of adventure and exploration. 

Hell is Us features no map, no compass and no quest markers. You will need to follow your instinct to explore the semi-open world and uncover the mysteries of the war torn land. 

Hell Is Us is launching on September 4 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #HellIsUs #ActionGames
title: Hell is Us - Official "This is Hell Is Us" Overview Trailer
